import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBars, faUser, faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Link,useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; function NavBar({ toggleSidebar }) { const location = useLocation(); const excludedPaths = ['/login', '/register', '/forgetps']; const isExcludedPage = excludedPaths.includes(location.pathname); if (isExcludedPage) { return null; // Don't render the Sidebar on the excluded pages } return (

{/* Navbar User Menu */}

); } export default NavBar;
